title: Sync Creatives Response
description: Response from creative sync operation with results for each creative

adcp_version.description: AdCP schema version used for this response

message.description: Human-readable result message (e.g., 'Synced 3 creatives: 2 created, 1 updated')

context_id.description: Context ID for tracking async operations and conversational approval workflows

status.description: Current task state - 'completed' for immediate success, 'working' for operations under 120s, 'submitted' for long-running operations

task_id.description: Unique identifier for tracking this async operation (present for submitted/working status)

dry_run.description: Whether this was a dry run (no actual changes made)

platform_id.description: Platform-specific ID assigned to the creative

changes.description: Field names that were modified (only present when action='updated')

errors.description: Validation or processing errors (only present when action='failed')

preview_url.description: Preview URL for generative creatives (only present for generative formats)

expires_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when preview link expires (only present when preview_url exists)

assigned_to.description: Package IDs this creative was successfully assigned to (only present when assignments were requested)

assignment_errors.description: Assignment errors by package ID (only present when assignment failures occurred)

^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+$.description: Error message for this package assignment
